home.description: Lorem ipsum dolor, sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Dignissimos atque nisi necessitatibus neque voluptates libero aperiam nam repellat quam, ab perferendis cum animi repellendus ratione eius dolores et iure rerum!

auth.displayNameMinLength: Display name must be at least 2 characters
auth.displayNameMaxLength: Display name must be less than 50 characters
auth.displayNameHelp: This will be your public display name. A unique username will be automatically generated.
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.authError: Failed to authenticate. Please try again.
auth.checkEmailMessage: Please check your email to confirm your account before signing in.
auth.confirmationFailed: Email confirmation failed. Please try again or contact support.
auth.invalidToken: Invalid confirmation link. Please try registering again.

resetPassword.title: Reset your password
resetPassword.successMessage: If an account exists with that email, we've sent password reset instructions to your email address.

profile.title: Your profile
profile.usernameAutoUpdate: Username is automatically generated and updated when you change your display name.
profile.noUser: No user is currently signed in.

plugins.label: Plugins
plugins.help: Comma separated. Accepts versions like name@1.2 or name v1.2

empty.noResults: No projects found with the current filters.

error.title: Error
error.forbidden: You are not allowed to edit this project.

activity.title: Activity
activity.problemLoadingData: There was a problem loading the activity data.
activity.uploadsAndComments: Uploads and comments will appear here.

createFeedback.title: New feedback
createFeedback.label: Summary
createFeedback.help: Provide a short summary; detailed comments can go on files or threads.

comments.title: Comments
comments.startConversation: Start the conversation with feedback and notes.
comments.openActivityOrFileToComment: Open an activity change, version or file to view and add comments.

versions.provideDescription: Please provide a description for the version.
versions.failedToUpdate: Failed to update version. Please try again.
versions.provideCustomVersionName: Please provide a custom version name.
versions.selectVersionToCopy: Select a version to copy from

uploads.failedToUploadFiles: Failed to upload files. Please try again.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.developmentMessage: UntitledOne is actively in development. We're excited you're here — features will appear and evolve rapidly. Thanks for joining early!
dashboard.quickStartDescription: Create a new project and invite collaborators to start working together.
dashboard.expectationDescription: Invitations, team management, and collaboration tools are being built. You might see changes frequently — we'll keep things as stable as possible.

hero.title: Create together. Grow together.
hero.description: UntitledOne is an open platform for audio creatives to collaborate remotely, exchange ideas and give targeted feedback. All in one place, without noise.
hero.tagline: Collaboration, file sharing and time-based feedback — built for audio creatives.

features.title: Why UntitledOne?
features.description: Built for creative collaboration, ownership and freedom — before the release phase.

collaboration.title: Smart Collaboration
collaboration.description: Work with others on projects, share files and maintain overview in versions, tasks and agreements.

creativity.title: In Your Creative Flow
creativity.description: Simple, intuitive tools that help you focus on creating — not searching or organizing.

ownership.title: You Are the Owner
ownership.description: Open-source, transparent and without commercial interests. You decide who sees what.

testimonials.title: What creators say
testimonials.description: From solo artist to band — discover how UntitledOne strengthens their collaboration.
testimonials.daan: "Finally a place where I have all my versions and feedback together. No noise, just music."
testimonials.nora: "It feels like I'm sitting in the studio with someone, even though we're kilometers apart."
testimonials.jonas: "So much easier to exchange and refine ideas. This will save time and bring creativity."

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Join a growing group of creators who together shape the future of music collaboration.
